2) Search Parameters.Client Intro: Pushkar is a seasoned product leader and entrepreneur with over a decade of experience building and scaling technology solutions. With a background in computer science and an MBA focused on strategy and entrepreneurship, he has guided cross-functional teams, launched new products, and driven significant recurring revenue growth. Known for his persistence, systems thinking, and first-principles approach to problem solving, Pushkar is now focused on acquiring a resilient business with steady cash flow and long-term growth potential.
Target Business Size: Public SDE floor: Not specified in the external profile.
Public acquisition ceiling: $5MM total deal size.
Alignment note: Public deal size target is $2MM to $5MM per the external profile. Any higher capacity is internal-only and not listed here.
Geography: Primary: Greater Phoenix, AZ, within about one hour of Phoenix.
Flexibility: Open to Southern California for the right opportunity.
Note: Local-first preference per external profile.
Industry Approach: Open: B2B services, healthcare services, IT and managed services, digital media and communications, SaaS and online businesses.
Also interested: Content and publishing, financial and data services, education and training, niche ecommerce, light manufacturing and industrial support, home and lifestyle services.
Strong NOs: Restaurants, retail, entertainment or recreation, agricultural services.
Online stance: Open to SaaS within reasonable multiples.
Business Characteristics: Operations: Established, recurring in nature, stable with minimal owner dependence; prefers low cyclicality and low capital expenditure.
Growth: Prefers steady growth and plans to expand with bolt-on acquisitions.
Customer model: Open to B2B and B2C, local or global; prefers recurring revenue and strong retention.
Regulation/licensing: Not specified in the external profile.
